pageTitle: BANVIT BANDIRMA VITAMINLI YE (BANVT:Borsa Istanbul): Stock Quote & Company Profile - Businessweek
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {4845=Banvit Bandirma Vitaminli Yem Sanayii Anonim Sirketi produces, slaughters, and sells chicken and turkey meat products in Turkey. The company’s chicken products include whole chicken, leg, breast, skewered, breaded, sauce, and other products; and turkey products comprise whole turkey, leg, breast, and other products. It also offers ready products consisting of burgers, meatballs, kebabs, coated products, and pastries; and delicatessen products, which include hams and salamis, frankfurters, and sausages. The company also exports its products to Azerbaijan, Macedonia, Kosovo, Northern Cyprus, Hong Kong, China, Georgia and Togo, Jordan, the United Arab Emirates, Saudi Arabia, and Benin. Banvit Bandirma Vitaminli Yem Sanayii Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Balikesir, Turkey.}
